wikipedia_page.main: Sir Timothy Edwin Paul Stevenson  (born 14 May 1948) was Lord Lieutenant of Oxfordshire, England between 2008 and 2021. A qualified barrister, he is also a businessman and former Chairman of Johnson Matthey plc.

response: Tim Stevenson (born 1945 in Vancouver, British Columbia) is a Canadian politician and United Church minister. He served as councillor on the Vancouver City Council, 2002 to 2018 as a member of Vision Vancouver. He was a founding member of Vision Vancouver.
* Tim Stevenson at Vancouver City Council
| Sir Tim Stevenson ||  || 31 August 2008 || 30 September 2021WhatDoTheyKnow.com: List of Deputy Lord Lieutenants of Oxfordshire
Sir Hugo Laurence Joseph Brunner  (born 17 August 1935) was Lord Lieutenant of Oxfordshire, England, between 1996 and 2008. He was succeeded by Tim Stevenson. He was also a Liberal Party politician.
